message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm offering it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm holding out for something closer to $13,750.  I truly believe this product will be a great asset for you.  What do you say?
I've considered your proposal, Alice. I'd like to offer $13,500 for the product.
